initBlock.name: Gregorian Calendar - Trailing 2 Years
initBlock.description: Defaults to the last 2 years + current year
tags: Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

selectStatements.query:
SELECT
    'TRAILING_2_GREGORIAN_YEARS',B.CAL_YEAR_ID
FROM
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_YEAR_ID, CURRENT_CAL_YEAR_CODE ,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_YEAR_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_YEAR_D 
    )A,
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_YEAR_ID,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_YEAR_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_YEAR_D 
    )B 
WHERE
    A.CURRENT_CAL_YEAR_CODE = 'Current'
AND B.RUN_COUNT BETWEEN A.RUN_COUNT-2 AND A.RUN_COUNT
